content: This biography of a living person **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help by adding reliable sources. Contentious material about living persons that is unsourced or poorly sourced **must be removed immediately** from the article and its talk page, especially if potentially libelous. *Find sources:* "Roshni Kaur Soin" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(July 2010)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Roshni Kaur Soin** is a Singaporean model and beauty pageant titleholder who was named [Miss Singapore World](/wiki/Miss_Singapore_World) 2007 and went on to represent [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) in [Miss World 2007](/wiki/Miss_World_2007) in [China](/wiki/China). She studied for a Psychology diploma in MDIS and works as a model. In 2010, she joined the cast of [Supermodel Me (season 2)](/wiki/Supermodel_Me_(season_2)) as one of the 12 aspiring models. This Singaporean biographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This biography article about an Asian contestant in a beauty pageant is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Roshni Kaur Soin
